# DNS Tool - Domain Security Audit & Email Authentication Checker
> Free domain security audit tool for IT professionals, executives, DNS specialists, and business leaders

DNS Tool provides instant, real-time DNS intelligence reports with email authentication validation (SPF, DKIM, DMARC), DNSSEC chain verification, BIMI brand checking, MTA-STS/TLS-RPT analysis, CAA certificate controls, and domain intelligence via RDAP. Every query fetches fresh data from multiple resolvers â€” never cached.

## Who It's For
- **Executives & Board Members**: Clear SECURE / PARTIAL / INSECURE verdicts for cybersecurity posture at a glance
- **IT Professionals**: Validate SPF, DKIM, DMARC configurations and troubleshoot DNS records
- **DNS Specialists**: Authoritative nameserver queries, multi-resolver consensus, DNSSEC chain validation
- **Business & Compliance**: Vendor security assessments, supply chain risk evaluation, brand protection

## Features
- Authoritative DNS record lookups (A, AAAA, MX, TXT, NS, SOA, CAA, SRV)
- Email authentication analysis (SPF, DKIM, DMARC with full policy parsing)
- DKIM key strength analysis (1024-bit weak vs 2048-bit+ strong)
- MTA-STS and TLS-RPT verification (RFC 8461, RFC 8460)
- DNSSEC chain validation with AD flag verification
- BIMI record and logo verification with VMC detection
- SMTP transport security (STARTTLS, TLS version, cipher strength)
- CAA record analysis (Certificate Authority Authorization)
- Enterprise DNS provider detection (Cloudflare, AWS, Google, Akamai, Azure)
- Multi-resolver consensus verification (Cloudflare, Google, Quad9)
- Domain registrar information via RDAP
- Security posture scoring with executive-level verdicts
